name: maithya/paystack-mpesa
description: Paystack-Mpesa is a PHP-based system that integrates Paystack payments with M-Pesa for user account creation and deposits. It features a modern tabular UI for a seamless user experience. The repository provides detailed steps to configure API keys, run the code on a local server, and set up Ngrok for testing callbacks. This solution is ideal for projects that require Paystack-M-Pesa integration for secure and efficient payment processing.
